alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 1:31PM CDT until April 20 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR WESTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHERN DALLAS AND EASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 131 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fair Grove to near Springfield to near Battlefield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A wind gust of 62 mph was recorded at the Springfield airport with these storms. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Strafford around 145 PM CDT. Fair Grove around 150 PM CDT. Conway around 200 PM CDT. Marshfield around 225 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Brookline, Olive, Elkland, Bassville, Turners, March, Galloway, Charity and Northview. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 76 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
